publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-658# Mr Lloyd Quinan: Trident Submarine Fleet at Faslane—That the Parliament agrees to initiate an investigation into the positive and negative economic and environmental effects of the stationing of the Trident submarine fleet at Faslane.

S1M-658# Mr Lloyd Quinan: Trident Submarine Fleet at Faslane—That the Parliament agrees to initiate an investigation into the positive and negative economic and environmental effects of the stationing of the Trident submarine fleet at Faslane.

S1M-658# Mr Lloyd Quinan: Trident Submarine Fleet at Faslane—That the Parliament agrees to initiate an investigation into the positive and negative economic and environmental effects of the stationing of the Trident submarine fleet at Faslane.
